[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@threebird/controls](./controls.md) &gt; [ScrollControlsProps](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.md)

## ScrollControlsProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [ScrollControls](./controls.scrollcontrols.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScrollControlsProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buffer?](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.buffer.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Buffer before and after element to start registering scroll. Number (percentage) between 0 and 1, defaults to 0.1 |
|  [cameraEnd?](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.cameraend.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> When in the scroll to end the camera animation, can be specified in px, % or vh |
|  [cameraStart?](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.camerastart.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> When in the scroll to start the camera animation, can be specified in px, % or vh |
|  [dampingFactor?](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 1 |
|  [endOffset?](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.endoffset.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Offset to end registering scroll, in px or vh. Default ends when bottom of element is at top of viewport. |
|  [scrollActions](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.scrollactions.md) | [ScrollAction](./controls.scrollaction.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Array of ScrollActions for custom scroll hooks |
|  [scrollElement](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.scrollelement.md) | HTMLElement | Long DOM Element to observe |
|  [startOffset?](./controls.scrollcontrolsprops.startoffset.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Offset to start registering scroll, in px or vh. Default starts when top of element is at bottom of viewport. |
